thread.title: Buffalo Bills-Jacksonville Jaguars live stream: Watch NFL game in London online
thread.title_full: Buffalo Bills-Jacksonville Jaguars live stream: Watch NFL game in London online

author: Matthew Fairburn | mfairburn@syracuse.com
title: Buffalo Bills-Jacksonville Jaguars live stream: Watch NFL game in London online
text:
Comments 
London — The Buffalo Bills and Jacksonville Jaguars will play in the first globally streamed NFL game in history when they take the field at Wembley Stadium in London Sunday. 
The Bills have done everything they can to make it seem like just another game week, and despite the 80,000-plus people that will be in attendance, Rex Ryan and company need to treat it that way. The 1-5 Jacksonville Jaguars shouldn't pose much of a threat, but they have experience playing in London. Meanwhile, the Bills can't afford another loss heading into the bye week. 
This isn't the sexiest matchup, but it's early morning NFL football, so it's tough to beat. The game kicks off at 9:30 a.m. 
If you're headed out to a bar to watch the game, you won't be able to buy alcohol until noon . 
Here's how to watch. Yahoo 
Here is how to stream the game on Yahoo: Connect your computer (or another device such as Apple TV, Roku or Xbox) to the Internet. Visit Yahoo.com or install the Yahoo app on your phone or tablet Click the link on Sunday at 9:30 a.m. Radio 
Syracuse — WKRL (100.9/106.5 FM), Buffalo – WGR (550 AM); Ithaca — WYXL (98.7 FM); Rochester — WCMF (96.5 FM) and WROC (950 AM). Complete list of Bills radio affiliates
